    • detectObject

      public Double detectObject(RangeSensor[] sensors)
      Find the object distance. If the sensor is in long mode and calculated distance is less that 1250mm switch to short mode otherwise keep in long mode. If in short keep in short if less than 1250mm otherwise switch back to long range mode
      Returns:
      range in mm
